Note: Signed "Bert Thomas." "No. 113" appears on the bottom left of the poster. "4-315. WT 21738/2798. 10,000. 2/18. G.P.Ltd E3719" appears on the bottom right of the poster. Orientation:  Vertical.
Description: Text says to feed the guns with war bonds and help to end the war. Illustration shows three military men on the battlefield.  A long roll of National War Bonds seems to be rolling out of their gun.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
